articles.title: What does Ukraine’s request to join EU mean? - India Today
articles.description: Ukraine’s President Zelenskyy had submitted the country’s application on Monday to join the European Union. But becoming a member is a complex process that can take years.

articles.title: Europe's joint Mars mission with Russia postponed by war - 1News
articles.description: While Europe has its own rockets to put satellites into orbit, it relies on Russian and American partners to send astronauts into space.
articles.content:
The launch of a joint Europe-Russia mission to Mars this year is now very unlikely due to sanctions linked to the war in Ukraine, the European Space Agency said on Tuesday.
